name: Elixir - Phoenix Framework
description: Sentry configuration for Phoenix applications with automatic request tracking
useCase: Phoenix web applications with performance monitoring
seGuidance: Recommended for all Phoenix customers. Sentry integrates with Phoenix and Plug to automatically capture request context and errors. Add Sentry.PlugCapture and Sentry.PlugContext to your endpoint. Use Sentry.LoggerBackend for comprehensive logging.
configCode:
# config/runtime.exs

config :sentry,
  dsn: System.get_env("SENTRY_DSN"),
  
  # Environment from Mix
  environment_name: config_env(),
  
  # Release version
  release: System.get_env("SENTRY_RELEASE", "1.0.0"),
  
  # Enable source code context
  enable_source_code_context: true,
  root_source_code_paths: [File.cwd!()],
  
  # Only report in these environments
  included_environments: [:prod, :staging],
  
  # Capture metadata
  tags: %{
    env: config_env()
  },
  
  # Configure client
  client: Sentry.HackneyClient,
  
  # Log backend integration
  log_level: :warning

# config/config.exs
config :logger,
  backends: [:console, Sentry.LoggerBackend]
